mapper.sql: id, masterID, userID, name, gender, company, phone, houseID, status, floor, building, roomNum, roomType, roomSize, tenement, tenementID, buildingID, originHouseStatus

SELECT
FROM (select h.id as id, m.ID as masterID, m.guest_no as userID, p.name as name, p.sex as gender, p.company, p.mobile as phone, h.id as houseID, h.state as status, n.building_id as floor, n.name as building, h.room_no as roomNum, r.name as roomType, h.area as roomSize, e.name as tenement, e.id as tenementID, n.id as buildingID, h.originState originHouseStatus from pr_house h left join prh_master m on m.id = h.master_id left join profile p on m.guest_no = p.guestno left join building_no n on h.building_no_id = n.id left join estate e on h.estate_id = e.id left join room_type r on h.ROOM_TYPE_ID = r.id ) tmp where 1=1
